title: FFS Stupid Client
body:
It Crashed to a black screen while in champ select, wtf i lost a promo because of your game not working 

EXTREMELY PISSED

Edit: Tried to get a support ticket, my account supposedly doesn't exist wtf riot

replies.body:
Hey DarkShade918,

If you post whatever information you can provide in the [**Help & Support**](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/f/ElA0rvVL) sub-boards, I would be more than happy to work with you to troubleshoot this issue.
